snippet: A small study of casual marijuana smokers has turned up evidence of changes in the brain, a possible sign of trouble ahead, researchers say....

headline.print_headline: Study Finds Signs of Brain Changes in Pot Smokers
headline.main: Study Finds Signs of Brain Changes in Pot Smokers

lead_paragraph: A small study of casual marijuana smokers has turned up evidence of changes in the brain, a possible sign of trouble ahead, researchers say.
